department: Katie McCann, Department of National Defence
short_summary: This purchase requires 8 x Quad-Band Satellite Simulators.
description: This requirement is for 8 x Quad-Band Satellite Simulators, 8 x BlueSky Mast and 8 x BlueSky Mounting Bracket; delivered to 7 CFSD.
full_summary:
===============

**Satellite Satcom Simulator Tender Announcement**
=====================================================

**Reference Number**: cb-518-45655707
**Amendment Number**: 3
**Solicitation Number**: W8476-246182/A

**Publication Date**: 2024-05-09
**Tender Closing Date**: 2024-06-03
**Amendment Date**: 2024-06-03
**Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-07-01
**Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-12-31

**Tender Status**: Expired

**UNSPSC Code**: 25151700 - Satellites
**Procurement Category**: Governmental departments (GD)
**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding

**Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements**: The tender is open to contractors who have entered into the following free trade agreements with Canada: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
**Regions of Delivery**: Canada, Alberta, Edmonton

**Contracting Entity Contact Information**

* **Name**: Katie McCann
* **Email**: [katie.mccann@forces.gc.ca](mailto:katie.mccann@forces.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: 613
* **Fax**: None
* **Address**: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada

**Tender Description**

This tender announcement is for the purchase of 8 x Quad-Band Satellite Simulators, 8 x BlueSky Mast and 8 x BlueSky Mounting Bracket. The equipment will be delivered to 7 Canadian Forces School of Aerospace Data Fusion (CFSD).

**Attachments**

Please refer to the following links to view the tender package:

* English version: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37313/ott_lstl-6969957-v1-3a_-w8476-246812_a_-_sotm_simulator_rfp_eng.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender
